short_summary: Purchase AXIOM 1.92TB ENTERPRISE EV200 2.5-INCH HOTSWAP SATA SSD or equivalent.

full_summary:
**RFQ R000148925: Request for Proposal (BPM019337)**

### Solicitation Summary

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of AXIOM 1.92TB ENTERPRISE EV200 2.5-INCH HOTSWAP SATA SSD or equivalent.

### Tender Details

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | BPM019337/23559 |
| Publication Date | August 16, 2023 |
| Closing Date | August 25, 2023 @ 2:00 PM EDT |
| Solicitation Status | Expired |

### Trade Agreements

The solicitation is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity

* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* National Capital Region (NCR)

### Regions of Delivery

* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity

Shared Services Canada
Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa Ontario K0A 0C3 Canada

### Contact Information

* Name: Agnes Kowalska
* Email: [agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-551-9034
* Fax: 000-000-0000
* Address: Data Centers and Internal Services, PVR Shared Services Canada, 180 Kent St., 13 Floor, PO Box 9808, STS T, Ottawa, Ontario K1G 4A8, Canada

### Tender Description

SSC requires suppliers to provide AXIOM 1.92TB ENTERPRISE EV200 2.5-INCH HOTSWAP SATA SSD or equivalent. Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca for further information.

Please download the required solicitation documents from: <https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/88CC88FC-1B83-401A-ADBF-B53F5D8AD204>

Note to the contractor: changes were made to be more concise and clear and to be easy to read, the original sharecroppers list of key values was unnecessary and was removed, the surface should be clean and not contain any excessive words.
